channel.title: kanteron on Kanteron Systems Blog
channel.description: Recent content in kanteron on Kanteron Systems Blog

item.title: Kanteron Systems to deliver webinar on AI in Healthcare organized by UMH
item.description: Miguel Hernandez University (Spain) organizes the Webinar ICT and Artificial Intelligence applied to the Health Sector on 16 June 2020, which will feature the presentation “Applications of Artificial Intelligence in Medicine” by Jorge Cortell, CEO of Kanteron Systems.

item.title: Kanteron Systems team presents 2 scientific papers at the European Society of Human Genetics annual meeting
item.description: Kanteron Systems Bioinformatics department, in collaboration with scientists from several institutions (like the University of Cambridge and Genomics England) presents 2 papers at the European Society of Human Genetics ESHG20 annual meeting which was to be held in Berlin (Germany) but was moved online due to CoViD19, June 06–09, 2020.

item.title: Kanteron Systems participates in the XII Biomedical Engineering Workshop
item.description: Organized by the Inter-University (Valencia University and Polytechnic University of Valencia, Spain) MSc. in Biomedical Engineering, the XII Biomedical Engineering Workshop took place online May 22, 2020.

item.title: Kanteron passes ISO 13485 audit
item.description: Kanteron Systems passed today the ISO 13485 audit by Bureau Veritas, receiving the Quality Management System (QMS) ISO 13485 Certification.

item.title: Donating N95 respirators and surgical masks
item.description: Kanteron Systems donated today a bath of N95 respirators and surgical masks to help local health authorities fight the CoViD-19 pandemic.

item.title: Donating a 3D printer to help produce protective face masks
item.description: Kanteron Systems donated today a 3D printer to help local health authorities produce emergency face-protection masks to help fight the CoViD-19 pandemic.

item.title: Kanteron Platform for COVID-19 reviewed by WHO experts
item.description: Kanteron Systems Platform for healthcare data integration has been reviewed by World Health Organization experts (former consultants) for its applicability to COVID-19.

item.title: Doing our part to fight COVID-19
item.description: From helping scientists with computational research to offering our technology to the EU to being early adopters of the “social-distancing” measures to limit the spread of COVID-19, Kanteron has tried to take a proactive, constructive and collaborative stance to contribute to the fight for health.

item.title: Kanteron appoints Erin Kogan as new CFO
item.description:
Kanteron Systems today announced that Erin Kogan, CFA, formerly CFO/COO of Mana Partners LLC, has joined Kanteron as Chief Financial Officer. In this role, Erin will manage the company’s fundraising process and capital structure. She will also be responsible for risk management and financial strategy planning, in order to help us achieve sustainable growth.

Erin is a technologically savvy financial services professional with a BA degree in Mathematics & Economics, MS degrees in Quantitative Finance (Rutgers University) and Business Research (Columbia Business School), and 10+ years of experience across market maker, broker-dealer, trading, and fintech companies.

item.title: Kanteron Presentation at the Congress of the Thai Royal College of Pathologists
item.description: Kanteron Systems’ CEO, Jorge Cortell, gave a presentation at the Congress of the Royal College of Pathologists of Thailand in Bangkok.

item.title: Kanteron wins International Expansion award by Santander Bank and University of Valencia Science Park
item.description: Kanteron Systems wins the ‘International Expansion’ award by Santander Bank at the University of Valencia Science Park’s X Anniversary gala.

item.title: Kanteron endorses the Universal Guidelines for Artificial Intelligence
item.description: Kanteron Systems has endorsed the Universal Guidelines for Artificial Intelligence.

item.title: Kanteron renews Medical Device Manufacturer License
item.description: Kanteron Systems has just renewed its Medical Device Manufacturer License.

item.title: Kanteron to participate in Qitcom - Qatar
item.description: October 29 to November 1 Kanteron Systems will exhibit at the Qatar IT Conference & Exhibition QITCOM, Entrepreneurship Zone, alongside over 100 other startups.

item.title: HIMSS Future50 includes Kanteron Systems CEO
item.description: Jorge Cortell, Kanteron Systems’ CEO, has been included in the HIMSS Future50 International: top 50 Healthcare IT leaders, in the category of Innovation.

item.title: Kanteron Systems presents Infectious Disease solution at BioInvestment Asia
item.description: Jorge Cortell, Kanteron Systems’ CEO, presented “Data integration and processing of Infectious Disease events” solution to manage the Dengue epidemic at the BioInvestment Asia forum held at EH 102 - 104, BITEC, in Bangkok.

item.title: NASA ranks Kanteron technology as top 3 health tech of the year and top software
item.description: NASA Space Technology Mission Directorate’s iTech initiative is a yearlong effort to find innovative ideas (through 3 annual Cycles) that address challenges and will fill gaps in five critical areas identified by NASA as having a potential impact on future exploration. In the focus area of Healthcare, Kanteron Systems’ Precision Medicine Software has been selected as a Top healthcare software of the year, top 3 healthcare technology of the year, and top 25 overall technology of Cycle II.

item.title: Kanteron technology selected by NASA to present at event in Florida
item.description: NASA iTech searches for and identifies advancements in technologies that are solving problems on Earth and have the potential to address existing challenges to enable NASA missions. NASA judges selected 10 innovations based on criteria including technical viability, likely impact on future space exploration, benefits to humanity and commercialization potential. One of those innovations selected by NASA is Kanteron Systems’ Precision Medicine Software.

item.title: Kanteron one of Europe’s top 100 Fastest Growing Companies
item.description: According to the metrics and methodology of the Financial Times 1000: Europe’s Fastest Growing Companies Kanteron Systems currently meets the criteria to be in the top 100 of Europe’s Fastest Growing Companies. Note: final inclusion or not in the next edition of the list will be decided by the editorial team of the FT during the next publication period (September-December 2019).

item.title: Kanteron team introduces Panelmaps at European Society of Human Genetics meeting in Sweden
item.description: Kanteron Systems presents its latest R&D development in NGS and CNV analysis application, Panelmaps, at the European Society of Human Genetics (ESHG19) annual meeting in Gothenburg (Sweden).

item.title: Kanteron Participates in Medical Data and AI conference at FISABIO
item.description: Kanteron Systems CEO, participated today as member of a round table in the Medical Data and AI conference which was held at the Foundation for the Promotion of Health and Biomedical Research of the Valencian Region (FISABIO), in Spain.

item.title: Participating in XI Biomedical conference at Polytechnic University of Valencia
item.description: Dr. Pablo Marin, Kanteron Systems Director of Bioinformatics, participated today in the XI Biomedical Engineering Conference organized by the Interuniversity Master in Biomedical Engineering (University of Valencia and Polytechnic University of Valencia).

item.title: Exhibiting at Europe's largest tech event, TNW in Amsterdam
item.description: The Next Web is Europe’s largest tech event (with over 17,000 attendees, 350 members of the media, 4000+ businesses, and 600+ startups), taking place every year in Amsterdam. This year it will take place May 9-10 at NDSM.

item.title: Kanteron introduces Flexible AI
item.description: Flexible AI means you can choose the data set that best fits your use case, and apply it to your relevant medical images. We include a training set for Prostate Cancer as a starting point, but that’s only the beginning! The AI setting allows the user to choose the desired model from the list of all available models along with their descriptions.

item.title: New Investor Relations app
item.description: After raising $2.3M in a PPL (Profit Participation Loan), Kanteron Systems launches its own Investors Relations app to manage up to date information exchange.

item.title: Kanteron Systems team presents a collaborative scientific paper at the III Congress of Young Researchers in Biomedicine
item.description: Kanteron Systems Bioinformatics department, in collaboration with scientists from several institutions (like the Medical Genomics Visualization Group, The Siimple Open-Source Organization, INCLIVA Genomics and Diabetes Unit, Diabetes and Associated Metabolic Diseases CIBER, Institute for Integrative Systems Biology I2SysBio, Sequencing Multiplex, and the Open-source software for Computational Biology group at Cambridge University) will present a paper at the III Congress of Young Researchers in Biomedicine (Conbiopreval) to be held April 24th-26th 2019, at the Prince Felipe Research Center in Valencia, Spain.

item.title: Jorge Cortell named CEO of the Year
item.description: CEO Year Awards 2019 by World Biz Magazine names Kanteron Systems’ CEO, Jorge Cortell, Healthcare IT (SME) CEO of the Year 2019.

item.title: Kanteron solution in Azure Marketplace and AppSource
item.description: Kanteron Systems announces the publication and general availability of Kanteron’s Precision Medicine solution (including Radiology PACS-RIS, Digital Pathology, Genomics and Pharmacogenomics modules) in Microsoft’s Azure Marketplace and AppSource.

item.title: National Cancer Research Center invites Kanteron Systems to present at European Cooperation Network in Oncology event
item.description: Spain’s National Cancer Research Center CNIO, the best in Europe and 4th in the world according to Nature, has invited Kanteron Systems to present at the European cooperation network in oncology ONCONET-SUDOE Workshop on Innovative IT for healthcare: “The patient journey: Information Technologies focused on the cancer patient” that will take place in the CNIO Auditorium (Madrid), April 3-4, 2019.

item.title: New Multiplatform KDS
item.description: Kanteron Systems is proud to announce a multi-platform (Windows, Linux and Apple OSX) version of its KDS advanced visualization and post-processing radiology workstation

item.title: Kanteron Systems team presents 3 collaborative scientific papers at the European Society of Human Genetics annual meeting
item.description: Kanteron Systems Bioinformatics department, in collaboration with scientists from several institutions (like the University of Cambridge, Genomics England, Zetta, INCLIVA, CIPF, I2SysBio, CSIC, and CIBERDEM) will present 3 papers at the European Society of Human Genetics (ESHG19) annual meeting to be held in Gothenburg, Sweden, June 15–18, 2019.

item.title: Kanteron's collaboration with Cambridge produces advanced solution for some of the main international genomics projects
item.description: Kanteron Systems Bioinformatics department, in collaboration with the Computational Biology Lab at the University of Cambridge and Agile Genomics, deliver advanced clinical solution chosen by some of the largest clinical genomics projects, like Genomics England, the International Cancer Genome Consortium, or the The European Bioinformatics Institute.

item.title: New 3D viewer
item.description: Kanteron Systems announces a new zero-footprint viewer, with 3D (MPR and volume reconstruction)

item.title: HIMSS 2019
item.description: Kanteron Systems will exhibit at HIMSS 2019, booth number 985

item.title: Kanteron Systems announces the availability of DirectTransfer. Say goodbye to firewalls, SSL or NAT
item.description: <!-- raw HTML omitted -->

item.title: CEO Monthly names Kanteron Best Medical Imaging & Genomic Data Provider, and its CEO Digital Pathology CEO of the Year
item.description: British magazine CEO Monthly has named Kanteron Systems Best Medical Imaging & Genomic Data Provider, and its CEO, Jorge Cortell, Digital Pathology CEO of the Year.

item.title: Kanteron Systems rated amongst top software startups in the world
item.description: Ratings agency Early Metrics rates Kanteron Systems among the top 4% of Healthcare Technology, and the top 7% overall (their badge rounds up to 10%) of the over 2,000 tech start-ups rated by them worldwide since 2014.

item.title: InsightsCare magazine chooses Kanteron's CEO as one of “The 20 Most Influential Leaders in Healthcare 2018"
item.description: InsightsCare magazine has listed Kanteron System’s CEO amongst “The 20 Most Influential Leaders in Healthcare 2018”, alongside industry leaders like Hyland’s Susan DeCathelineau or CSI Healthcare IT’s Kate Mays, and startups like Paragon Biosciences’ Jeff Aronin or AdhereTech’s Josh Stein.

item.title: Kanteron Systems wins the 2018 Frost & Sullivan "Global Technology Innovation Award" for Precision Medicine
item.description: Kanteron Systems has won the 2018 Frost & Sullivan “Global Technology Innovation Award - Precision Medicine Platform Solutions”.

item.title: Kanteron Systems installs first digital pathology diagnostic system in Mexico
item.description: On September 28th, Kanteron Systems and its distributor, Reliable, installed the first digital pathology diagnostic system in Mexico.

item.title: Kanteron Systems to participate in Longevity World Congress
item.description: The first congress on longevity and genomics in Europe will be held November 7 and 8 in Valencia (Spain) and will feature Kanteron Systems.

item.title: UPDATE - Kanteron Systems expresses interest in the leveraged buyout of Agfa-Gevaert NV
item.description: THIS POST HAS BEEN UPDATED 19/09/2018 - Kanteron Systems confirms it has sent the Board of Directors of Agfa-Gevaert NV a non-binding indication of interest for the acquisition of all shares in Agfa-Gevaert NV by way of a voluntary conditional public takeover offer of Kanteron Systems to all shareholders of Agfa-Gevaert NV.

item.title: Kanteron implements four day workweek
item.description: Kanteron Systems has unanimously decided to implement a four day workweek, from Monday to Thursday.

item.title: Kanteron Systems CEO, amongst The 30 Most Creative CEOs of 2018
item.description: Mirror Review magazine has chosen Jorge Cortell, CEO of Kanteron Systems, amongst The 30 Most Creative CEOs of 2018.

item.title: Kanteron Systems featured full page in largest circulation newspaper in Spain
item.description: El Pais, the general interest newspaper with largest circulation in Spain (and largest online Spanish news outlet in the world) features today Kanteron Systems in a full page article.

item.title: Kanteron in “The 10 Most Innovative Digital Healthcare Solution Providers 2018”
item.description: InsightsCare Magazine has named Kanteron Systems as one of “The 10 Most Innovative Digital Healthcare Solution Providers 2018”.

item.title: Kanteron Systems moves its headquarters
item.description: Effective Monday July 2nd, Kanteron Systems moves its headquarter offices to a new campus.

item.title: Kanteron Systems amongst the major players of Digital Pathology
item.description: According to the report “Global Digital Pathology Market Size, Share, Development, Growth and Demand Forecast to 2023” by PS Market Research, Kanteron Systems is one of the major players operating in the global digital pathology market.

item.title: Kanteron Systems sponsors VLCSofting
item.description: Kanteron Systems sponsors the enterprise software event VLCSofting.

item.title: Kanteron Systems officially one of "The 30 Most Valuable Tech Titans"
item.description: Kanteron Systems has been featured in the annual “The 30 Most Valuable Tech Titans” list.

item.title: Tele-Genomics for Precision Medicine on Google Cloud Platform
item.description: Kanteron Systems has introduced Tele-Genomics on Google Cloud Platform.

item.title: Kanteron Systems listed as Top Key Player in Digital Pathology Report
item.description: The 2017 Global Digital Pathology Analytics Industry Report lists Kanteron Systems as Top Key Player in the industry .

item.title: Kanteron Systems video interview by Spanish Export Agency
item.description: The Spanish Government’s Institute for Foreign Trade (ICEX) interviewed Kanteron Systems’ Founder & CEO, and its COO, for the El Exportador program.
